attributes.action: Make it illegal to be a billionaire. You can't possibly earn a billion pounds (the most eminent surgeons and doctors, people who are highly valued in our society,couldn't earn a billion pounds if they worked for a hundred years. So why do we let banks create these billionaires?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I created this petition last year and got 13 signatures.Three of them read,"What if you live in Zimbabwe 1b=£1000." and "make it illegal to be envious DO something for yourself and "why don't eat basic rations and give rest to poor?Grow up".Well,I am grown up and a year on I think my petition is even more relevant.Banks are in meltdown yet people still make millions from trading in money.Please think about this you dont need a billion pounds-it's ludicrous.This isn't written out of envy and I am doing something for myself thank you very much so please just put your name to this petition-what harm can it do?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
